title: Can't join clubs
body:
Hi, I wanted to invite my friend's side account to my club but I keep getting this message, 

https://i.imgur.com/aAgkKTh.png

what can I do so he can join us??

replies.body: It might just be due to the fact that his account was just created yesterday. Let me know if you still can't add him after another day or so.

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=pe4ggbvj,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-10-26T02:43:28.891+0000)
>
> It might just be due to the fact that his account was just created yesterday. Let me know if you still can't add him after another day or so.

Thank you, it works now!
How long did you have to wait to be able to invite them?

Hey Kiwistealer, i have the exact same problem but my account was created a week ago ~, and i have plenty of champions. My friends that has a even newer account could join. 

My "Clubs" tab is grayed out aswell.. Could you help perhaps?
aRE you or were you at honor lvl zero? i am having the same problem but im thinking it might be from my chat restriction
